description: Organize components following UI/UX best practices and ensure proper component hierarchy

workstreams.name: Analyze component structure and identify issues
Move feature components to proper directories
workstreams.notes: Moved appointments and communications, consolidated error components

workstreams.name: Organize UI components by category
workstreams.notes: Documented current state and provided roadmap for UI component organization

workstreams.name: Document component organization patterns
workstreams.notes: Created ORGANIZATION.md (480+ lines) and comprehensive report

decisions.decision: Use features/ directory for all feature-specific components, not root-level feature directories
decisions.rationale: Centralized feature components improve discoverability and maintain clear separation from UI primitives

decisions.decision: Consolidate error components into shared/errors/ only
decisions.rationale: Three separate error directories create confusion; shared/errors/ already has the most complete implementation

decisions.decision: Move all UI components to categorized subdirectories
decisions.rationale: Having 50+ files at ui/ root makes components hard to find; subdirectories improve organization

decisions.decision: Preserve dynamic import patterns for performance-critical components
decisions.rationale: AppointmentCalendar uses dynamic imports for FullCalendar (~200KB) - preserve this optimization

decisions.decision: Document remaining consolidation opportunities rather than force all moves
decisions.rationale: Some components (incidents, medications, documents) need careful review to avoid breaking changes; document for future refactoring
